minions.name: Queen Fluffy
minions.description: Talent: Take control of a minion of power 3 or less until the end of the turn

minions.name: Whiskers
minions.description: Talent: Play an extra action. Destroy one of your minions

minions.name: Muffin
minions.description: Take control of a minion of power 3 or less until the end of the turn

minions.name: Mr. Grumpers
minions.description: Choose a minion. It has -2 power until the end of the turn

actions.name: Cat Fight
actions.description: Choose one of your minions. Draw cards equal to that minion's power. Destroy that minion

actions.name: Grumpiness
actions.description: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion has -2 power

actions.name: Can Has Cheeseburger?
actions.description: Special: Before a base scores, take control of a minion there, of power 3 or less, until the end of the turn

actions.name: Cat's Paw
actions.description: Take control of a minion of power 5 or less until the end of the turn

actions.name: Hang in There
actions.description: Play on one of your minions. Ongoing: If this minion would be destroyed, move it to another base and destroy this action instead

actions.name: Hissy Fit
actions.description: Play on a base. Ongoing: All other players' minions here have -1 power

actions.name: Invisible Bicycle
actions.description: Choose a base. Move any number of minions of power 2 or less from there to another base.

actions.name: Nine Lives
actions.description: Destroy one of your minions. Play an extra minion
